tiles.markdownText:
# Defect and Measurement Overview
### For lines with OTG, OBS, and/or OLG
[Documentation](http://midas.o-i.com/docs/solutions/defectsmeasurementsspeed)

# Defect and Measurement Overview
### For lines with WOF
[Documentation](http://midas.o-i.com/docs/solutions/defectsmeasurementsspeed)

# Defect and Measurement Overview
### For lines with FTA
[Documentation](http://midas.o-i.com/docs/solutions/defectsmeasurementsspeed)

parameters.description: Define the production line of interest
Select the cavities to filter the visuals by.
Filter out unwanted probes from the visual
Select the probes related to the Out of Round inspection
Define the probe(s) used for the Leaner measurement
Define the probe(s) setup for Bent Neck measurement
Select which machine pressure(s) you would like to visualize
Define the unit of measure for FTA measurements
Select the tagnames to visualize from the furnace and/or forehearth

queries.text:
['_ce_values']
| where isempty(['_defects']) or defect in (['_defects'])
| where isempty(['_position']) or position in (['_position'])
| where isempty(['_sections']) or section in (['_sections'])
| where isempty(['_cavities']) or cavity in (['_cavities'])
| where isnotempty(section) and isnotempty(cavity)
| summarize defect_count=dcountif(idcontainer,isnotempty(defect)) by position, defect
| sort by defect_count desc
| extend ['sec-cav']=strcat(substring(position,6,2),'-',substring(position,8,1))
| project position, ['sec-cav'], defect, defect_count

['_ce_values']
| where inspection_name == 'OTG' or inspection_name == 'OBS'
| where isempty(['_position']) or position in (['_position'])
| where isempty(['_sections']) or section in (['_sections'])
| where isempty(['_cavities']) or cavity in (['_cavities'])
| where measurement_name == 'Max. Thickness'
| where isempty(['_thickness_probes']) or measurement_probe  in (['_thickness_probes'])
| summarize avg(value) by bin(utctimestamp,5m), bin(localtimestamp,5m), lineupl, location, productionline,inspection_name, measurement_name, measurement_probe
| extend series_name = strcat(measurement_name, '-', measurement_probe)

['_ce_values']
| where inspection_name == 'OTG' or inspection_name == 'OBS'
| where isempty(['_position']) or position in (['_position'])
| where isempty(['_sections']) or section in (['_sections'])
| where isempty(['_cavities']) or cavity in (['_cavities'])
| where measurement_name == 'Min. Thickness'
| where isempty(['_thickness_probes']) or measurement_probe  in (['_thickness_probes'])
| summarize avg(value) by bin(utctimestamp,5m), bin(localtimestamp,5m), lineupl, location, productionline,inspection_name, measurement_name, measurement_probe
| extend series_name = strcat(measurement_name, '-', measurement_probe)

| where isempty(['_cavities']) or cavity in (['_cavities'])
| where measurement_name == 'Lean'
| where isempty(['_leaner_probes']) or measurement_probe  in (['_leaner_probes'])

| where isempty(['_sections']) or section in (['_sections'])
| where isempty(['_cavities']) or cavity in (['_cavities'])
| where measurement_name == 'Out Of Round'
| where isempty(['_oor_probes']) or measurement_probe  in (['_oor_probes'])
| summarize avg(value) by bin(utctimestamp,5m), bin(localtimestamp,5m), lineupl, location, productionline,inspection_name, measurement_name, measurement_probe

['_ce_values']
| where isempty(['_position']) or position in (['_position'])
| where isempty(['_sections']) or section in (['_sections'])
| where isempty(['_cavities']) or cavity in (['_cavities'])
| where isempty(['_defects']) or defect in (['_defects'])
| summarize defect_count=dcountif(idcontainer,isnotempty(defect)) by position
| extend ['sec-cav']=strcat(substring(position,6,2),'-',substring(position,8,1)), section=substring(position,6,2), cavity = substring(position,8,1)
| where defect_count > 0 and isnotempty(section) and isnotempty(cavity)
| sort by position asc

['_ce_values']
| where isempty(['_position']) or position in (['_position'])
| where isempty(['_sections']) or section in (['_sections'])
| where isempty(['_cavities']) or cavity in (['_cavities'])
| where isempty(['_defects']) or defect in (['_defects'])

['_job_info']
| where tagname in ('configuredSpeed', 'activeSectionCount', 'numGobs')
| project tagname, toreal(value)
| evaluate pivot(tagname, avg(value))
| extend cavity_rate = round(configuredSpeed/(activeSectionCount*numGobs),2)
| extend display=strcat(configuredSpeed, " BPM : ", cavity_rate, " CR")

['_job_info']
| where tagname in ('configuredSpeed', 'activeSectionCount', 'numGobs')
| project tagname, toreal(value)
| evaluate pivot(tagname, avg(value))
| extend cavity_rate = round(configuredSpeed/(activeSectionCount*numGobs),2)
| extend display=strcat(configuredSpeed, " BPM : ", cavity_rate, " CR")

['_job_info']
| where tagname in ('configuredSpeed', 'activeSectionCount', 'numGobs')
| project tagname, toreal(value)
| evaluate pivot(tagname, avg(value))
| extend cavity_rate = round(configuredSpeed/(activeSectionCount*numGobs),2)
| extend display=strcat(configuredSpeed, " BPM : ", cavity_rate, " CR")

['_ce_values']
| where inspection_name == 'OTG' or inspection_name == 'OBS'
| where isempty(['_position']) or position in (['_position'])
| where isempty(['_sections']) or section in (['_sections'])
| where isempty(['_cavities']) or cavity in (['_cavities'])
| where measurement_name in ('Min. Thickness', 'Max. Thickness')
| where isempty(['_thickness_probes']) or measurement_probe  in (['_thickness_probes'])
| where value > 0 and value < 1000
| summarize avg(value) by bin(utctimestamp,5m), bin(localtimestamp,5m), lineupl, location, productionline,inspection_name, measurement_name, measurement_probe
| extend measurement_name=iff(measurement_name == 'Max. Thickness', 'max_thickness','min_thickness')
| evaluate pivot(measurement_name, avg(avg_value))
| extend ratio = round(toreal(max_thickness)/toreal(min_thickness),3);

['_ce_values']
| where inspection_name == 'OTG' or inspection_name == 'OBS'
| where isempty(['_position']) or position in (['_position'])
| where isempty(['_sections']) or section in (['_sections'])
| where isempty(['_cavities']) or cavity in (['_cavities'])
| where measurement_name == 'Bent Neck'
| where isempty(['_bent_neck_probe']) or measurement_probe  in (['_bent_neck_probe'])
| summarize avg(value) by bin(utctimestamp,5m), bin(localtimestamp,5m), lineupl, location, productionline,inspection_name, measurement_name, measurement_probe
| extend series_name = strcat(measurement_name, '-', measurement_probe)

['_job_info']
| where tagname == 'articleName'
| extend display = tostring(value)

['_job_info']
| where tagname == 'articleName'
| extend display = tostring(value)

['_job_info']
| where tagname == 'articleName'
| extend display = tostring(value)

['_ce_values']
| where isempty(['_defects']) or defect in (['_defects'])
| where isempty(['_position']) or position in (['_position'])
| summarize count=dcountif(idcontainer,isnotempty(defect)) by defect
| where isnotempty(defect)
| sort by count desc

let plant_info = lines;
let measurements =
silver
| where timestamp between(_startTime .. _endTime) and device == 'iri' and category == 'measurements' and lineUpl == _lineupl
| extend idcontainer=tostring(data.idContainer), position=tostring(data.position)
| mv-expand kind=array data
| where tostring(data[0])=='measurements'
| mv-expand kind=array inspections=data[1]
| extend inspection_name=tostring(inspections[0]), measurements=inspections[1]
| project-away data, inspections
| mv-expand kind=array measurements=measurements
| extend measurement_name = tostring(measurements[0]), measurements=measurements[1]
| extend probe_names = measurements.probeNames
| extend measurements=bag_remove_keys(measurements, dynamic(['probeNames', 'thresholds']))
| mv-expand kind=array measurements
| extend probe_num = substring(measurements[0], 6,1), value=toreal(measurements[1])
| extend probe_label = strcat(probe_num, " ", probe_names[probe_num])
| lookup kind=leftouter plant_info on $left.lineUpl==$right.lineUPL
| project utctimestamp=timestamp, localtimestamp=datetime_utc_to_local(timestamp, timeZone), lineupl=lineUpl, location=location, productionline=productionLine, position, value, idcontainer, inspection_name, measurement_name, measurement_probe=probe_label, section=substring(position,6,2), cavity=substring(position,8,1);
let defects=
silver
| where timestamp between(_startTime .. _endTime) and device == 'iri' and category == 'defects' and lineUpl == _lineupl
| extend idcontainer=tostring(data.idContainer), position=tostring(data.position)
| mv-expand kind=array data
| where tostring(data[0])=='defects'
| mv-expand kind=array data=data[1]
| where tostring(data[0])=='CLB Input'
| mv-expand kind=array defect=data[1]
| project idcontainer, tostring(defect[1]);
measurements
| lookup kind=leftouter defects on idcontainer
| project-rename defect=defect_1

let plant_info = lines;
silver
| where timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime) and device == 'gmis' and category == 'job' and lineUpl == _lineupl
| summarize arg_max(timestamp, *) by lineUpl
| lookup kind=leftouter lines on $left.lineUpl==$right.lineUPL
| mv-expand kind=array data
| project utctimestamp=timestamp, localtime=datetime_utc_to_local(timestamp, timeZone), lineupl=lineUpl, location, productionline=productionLine, tagname=tostring(data[0]), value=tostring(data[1])

let plant_info = lines;
silver
| where timestamp between (_startTime .. _endTime) and device in ('mcs', 'dfc') and lineUpl == _lineupl
| lookup lines on $left.lineUpl==$right.lineUPL
| project utctimestamp=timestamp, localtimestamp=datetime_utc_to_local(timestamp,timeZone), tagname=tostring(data.tagname), value=round(toreal(data.value),2)

materialized_view('MV_MFG_PlantList')
| distinct location, productionLine, lineUpl
| extend plant_label = strcat(location, " ", productionLine)
| sort by plant_label asc
| where isnotempty(lineUpl) and isnotempty(productionLine) and strlen(productionLine) < 3 and strlen(productionLine) > 1
| sort by plant_label asc

['_ce_values']
| distinct position
| sort by position asc
| extend ['sec-cav'] = strcat(substring(position,6,2), '-',substring(position,8,1))

['_ce_values']
| distinct position
| extend section = substring(position,6,2)
| distinct section
| sort by section asc

['_ce_values']
| distinct position
| extend cavity = substring(position,8,1)
| distinct cavity
| sort by cavity asc

['_ce_values']
| where inspection_name in ('OTG', 'OBS')
| distinct inspection_name, measurement_probe

['_ce_values']
| where inspection_name in ('OTG', 'OBS')
| distinct inspection_name, measurement_probe

['_ce_values']
| where inspection_name == 'OLG'
| distinct inspection_name, measurement_probe

['_ce_values']
| where inspection_name in ('OTG', 'OBS')
| distinct inspection_name, measurement_probe

['_ce_values']
| where isnotempty(defect)
| distinct defect
| sort by defect asc

['_he_machine_pressures']
| where lineupl == _lineupl
| distinct tagname
| sort by tagname asc

['_fnfh']
| distinct tagname
| sort by tagname asc
